item.description: Things to talk about # Trees UI tree VDOM tree Widget Attributes (Scalar, Widget, WidgetColl) Definitions + Builders Reconciler State ViewNode Runner + ViewAdapter Xamarin.Forms Builders Markers ViewBuilders Extensions

Architecture - Virtualized collections # Virtualized collection enables displaying a scrolling list of data while only instantiating the visible rows. When scrolling, the no longer visible rows are reused and updated with the new data. In Xamarin.Forms, this is done via 2 controls: ListView and CollectionView. Also those controls support grouping data and displaying a group header/footer. My main idea was to let the user pass in its data source and declare a template function (as well as 2 others for header/footer).
